content: केवल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [केव् सेवने वृषा° कल्] {@--1@} Peculiar, exclusive, uncommon; <ls>Pt. 2. 134.</ls> {@--2@} Alone, more, sole, only, isolated; स हितस्य न केवलां श्रियं प्रतिपेदे सकलान् गुणानपि <ls>R. 8. 5</ls>; न केवलानां पयसां प्रसूतिमवेहि मां कामदुघा प्रसन्नां <ls n="R.">2. 63</ls>; <ls n="R.">15. 1</ls>; <ls>Ku. 2. 34.</ls> {@--3@} Whole, entire, absolute, perfect. {@--4@} Bare, uncovered (as ground); <ls>Ku. 5. 12.</ls> {@--5@} Pure, simple, unmingled, unattended (by anything else); कातर्यं केवला नीतिः <ls>R. 17. 47.</ls> {@--6@} Selfish, envious. --ली, --लं The doctrine of absolute unity of spirit and matter. --ली Astronomical science. --लं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Only, merely, solely, entirely, absolutely, wholly; केवलमिदमेव पृच्छामि <ls>K. 155</ls>; न केवलं-जपि not only-but; वसु तस्य विभोर्न केवलं गुणवत्तापि परप्रयोजना <ls>R. 8. 31</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> also <ls n="R.">3. 19</ls>, <ls n="R. 3.">20</ls>, <ls n="R. 3.">31.</ls>
